These are the virtues that have allowed me to rise to the pinnacle of dominance, and it is essential that my followers understand their significance. I would gather my most trusted lieutenants and warriors around me, my eyes scanning the crowd to ensure that every face is attentive and receptive.

"My loyal companions," I begin, my voice low and deliberate, "our strength lies not in our individual prowess, but in our unwavering dedication to our cause. Loyalty is the backbone of our organization, the glue that holds us together in the face of adversity. Without it, we are nothing but a rabble of selfish mercenaries, susceptible to division and defeat."

I pause, surveying the room to ensure that my words have sunk in. "Obedience, on the other hand, is the key to our success. It is the lubricant that keeps our machine well-oiled, allowing us to move with precision and purpose. When we act as one, with a single mind and a unified will, we are unstoppable. Our enemies tremble before us, knowing that we will not be swayed by petty squabbles or personal interests."

My gaze narrows, my voice taking on a harder edge. "But loyalty and obedience are not simply virtues; they are necessities. Those who waver, who question my authority or hesitate to carry out my orders, will be dealt with swiftly and severely. I will not tolerate dissent or disloyalty in any form.
